Class Employee

java.lang.Object
Employee
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin
public class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the employee, and has all the employee functions in it
Author:
Refined Storage developers

    • Employee

      public Employee​(int id, java.lang.String user_name, java.lang.String pw, int prio)
      This constructor class sets the passed parameters as variables
      Parameters:
      id - - the id that is being used
      user_name - - the name that is being used
      pw - - the password that is being used
      prio - - the role that is being used (admin, employee)

    • search_item

      public java.lang.String[][] search_item​(DbFunctions Db, boolean search_by_id, boolean search_by_name, boolean search_by_brand, java.lang.String text)
      This method is used to look for a determined item in the database. Only one parameter of id, name, brand can be true at a time
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      search_by_id - - true if wanted search by id, false if not
      search_by_name - - true if wanted search by name, false if not
      search_by_brand - - true if wanted search by brand false if not
      text - - the value that wants to be searched
      Returns:
      string with all the materials that correspond with the text parameter

    • list_inventory

      public java.lang.String[][] list_inventory​(DbFunctions Db)
      This method is used to list all the values of the table material in the database
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      Returns:
      string with all the values of the table materialS

    • manage_inventory

      public int manage_inventory​(DbFunctions Db, int item_id, int quantity, boolean add, boolean remove)
      This method is used to update the quantity in the table material of the wanted material
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      item_id - - the id of the material
      quantity - - the quantity that is to be removed or added
      add - - true if quantity is to be added, false if not
      remove - - true if quantity is to be removed, false if not
      Returns:
      0 if quantity to be removed is less then quantity existent, 1 if no errors

    • change_password

      public int change_password​(DbFunctions Db, java.lang.String old_password, java.lang.String new_password, java.lang.String new_password_confirmation)
      This method is used to change the password in the user database
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      old_password - - the password that is in the database
      new_password - - the desired new password
      new_password_confirmation - - the desired new password
      Returns:
      0 if it was successful, 1 if the new password is the same as the old password, 2 if the new password and the password confirmation are not the same, 3 if the old password is incorrect, 4 if error
